title: Phone screen is black but phone is on, and will not unlock. I can feel it try to unlock but the screen remains black, music is also still playing from it.
content: My phone screen is black and is not showing the lock screen or anything. When i try to unlock it with my fingertip it vibrates like it is trying, but then the screen remains black. When i hit the power button on the side nothing happens. Any ideas how I can fix this? Screen is not broken scratched or anything.
